headline: Media Fights Senate Limit On Coverage
abstract: The Senate will control the cameras during the impeachment trial, limiting what viewers see, and reporters will be confined to roped-off areas.
lead_paragraph: News coverage of President Trump’s impeachment trial in the Senate began last week with a Republican senator calling a CNN reporter “a liberal hack” in the halls of Congress and laughing about it later that night during a Fox News interview.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
